title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 129.1 - When permit may be granted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 129.1 - When permit may be granted

State Regulations

An annual maintenance permit may be granted to political
subdivisions, public service and public utility corporations for the
maintenance and replacement of existing facilities. The installations involved
are electric power and telephone lines, poles, water and gas mains and such
other underground and aboveground installations as may be
authorized. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
129.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
